subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Anyone suggesting a week ago that the United States would be in the final of the Confederations Cup, or that it stood any chance against the five-time world champion Brazil, might have been thought a little crazy.
snippet: Anyone suggesting a week ago that the United States would be in the final of the Confederations Cup, or that it stood any chance against the five-time world champion Brazil, might have been thought a little crazy.
